profile:
Canada's Restoration Services is a leader in the restoration industry with over 12 years of experience. We specialize in mold removal, asbestos testing and removal, water damage restoration, fire and smoke damage and reconstruction.

We operate 24/7 and guarantee to be on site within 45 minutes for all emergencies. We provide same day appointments and have completed over 10,000 inspections and jobs nationwide. We work with every insurance company across Canada to help make the process quicker and easier for you and your family. We also provide free financing for all eligible customers to help ease any burdens.

We are a nationwide company and have been awarded over 13 years running  by HomeStars as Top Restoration Company. We value our customers and work hard to provide professional and reliable services. Call and speak to an expert today! We service Ontario, Quebec, and Alberta!
service_area:
Our Certified Experienced Water Damage Specialists and Mold Inspectors are strategically located throughout the provinces.

This enables Emergency Response within 45 minutes or less.

No time? Emergency? we are located in or serve every major city in Alberta, Ontario, Quebec. Call Now - help is close by!

Our service areas include and are not limited to;

For Ontario Service Area's

profile:
Specialties
24 Hours Emergency Water / Flood damage Clean Up  restoration / Flooded Basement From Sewage Backup in Toronto and surrounding greater Toronto area.
 
We also are specialized in: Fire Damage, Black Mold Removal, Asbestos Abatement Removal, Odor Removal, Bed Bug Removal, Smoke Damage, Emergency Board Up Services, Applied Structural Drying, Wind and Hail Damage, Emergency Roof Repair, Sewage Remediation, Trauma Cleanup, Content Restoration, Inspection Services
 
For Cleaning Services we provide: Carpet Cleaning, Gutter Cleaning, Upholstery Cleaning, Tile and Grout Cleaning, Mobile Auto Detailing, Window Cleaning, Area Rug Cleaning, Power Washing
 
For Renovation Contractor Services And Installation we provide: Hardwood Supply and Install, Laminate Supply and Install, Tiles Supply and Install, Carpet Supply and Install, Gutter Supply and Install Aluminum Works, General Contracting Services, Basement Renovation, Siding Supply and Install, Kitchen Remodel Design, Painting Services, Handyman Services, Bath Remodel
 
History
Established in 1993.
 
The Restorators Inc started in 1993 restoring water damage loss and fire damage cleaning. Independently owned and operated for restoration and mitigate losses. We also clean carpet and rugs using only the best in product! Also have full in house teams for all renovation type of jobs, from exterior to interior, look no further and give us a call for a free estimate.

Fully certified water damage, emergency flood response, mold remediation, asbestos abatement, fire damage, disinfection (COVID-19) and HVAC professionals. profile:
At Shield Restoration, we understand you didn’t plan for this damage and it’s now thrown off your daily life. Our Emergency team responds quickly both in the GTA and NOW we have an office in the south end of Barrie, to help prevent further water damage, expedite disaster clean up or fire restoration. We ensure the work is done according to the standard of care and save as much of your content as possible. The faster we remove the damage and restore your home, the quicker you will forget this every happened.

Collaboration with you, your insurance carrier and broker ensures everyone is on the same page. Our priority is always YOU and YOUR PROPERTY. Our Promise is excellence in customer service, taking the time to clean and restore your property to meet or exceed your expectations. All our work is guaranteed for as long as you own your home!


Shield Restoration takes pride in our ability to work collaboratively with our insurance partners.

We are have both preferred relationships with several carriers and work very well with all Insurance companies.

Our key to success is the understanding that we all have a role to play in the successful remediation and restoration of any insurance claim.

Our quick response, cause of loss reporting and our use of DASH software to track our workflow, allows for ease of communication with both adjusters and homeowners.

Our promise is to avoid surprises for all parties with heightened communication and continued updating of the progress of each project.

When we share a client, as an insurance adjuster you can be reassured that we are here to help you and the insured with our boutique-like service and collaborative approach.
services:
Residential and Commercial Restoration
Water Damage
Wind Damage
Fire Damage
Mould Damage
specialities:
At Shield Restoration, we stand by our work. We collaborate with you to ensure that you understand what the plan is for repairing your home. We help you with the selection process for flooring, paints and more. You can be involved in this process as much or as little as you would like. Before we finish, we require your stamp of approval that you are satisfied with our work.

We guarantee* our work as part of our partnership with your insurance company and match their expectation for guarantees. In addition, for non-insurance losses, we will guarantee* our work for as long as you own your home!

Any damage as a result of any future loss cannot be guaranteed.
Visit our website to calculate your POWER CONSUMPTION
warranty_terms: Yes. Kindly ask for details. Depends on project completed.

profile:
Fixall Restoration is a locally owned and operated disaster restoration company located in Etobicoke. Although our office is in Etobicoke, our restoration professionals operate in all Greater Toronto Area, including Vaughan,  Mississauga, Brampton, Markham, etc.

We clean and restore properties damaged from flood, fire, smoke, mold. Our team is certified and licensed in the emergency restoration field.

We also have lots of experience in the restoration field in houses and businesses all around GTA and northern Ontario.

Our responsibility is to inform and communicate with you about all cleaning and restoration procedures we follow. Also we are here to answer any other questions you might have for us. We offer restoration services 24/7 according to your needs.
